item.title: My First Blog
item.description: #python code chunk fruit_prices = { 'apple': 0.65, 'mango': 1.50, 'strawberry': '$3/lb', 'musk melon': 'unavailable' } fruit_prices['mango'] ## 1.5 #R code chunk library(reticulate) py$fruit_prices ## $apple ## [1] 0.65 ## ## $mango ## [1] 1.5 ## ## $strawberry ## [1] "$3/lb" ## ## $`musk melon` ## [1] "unavailable" x <- "dog" #another python code chunk r.x.capitalize().swapcase()*100 ## ''
